  • May 11, 2016

    Roadtrip Blog

    My trip with Wei Wei across the United States and Canada, from Nashville to Chicago to Toronto to Montreal to our nation's capitol.

  • Apr 27, 2016

    Deep Language Modeling for Question Answering using Keras

    This post provides an in-depth introduction to using Keras for deep language modeling. Includes sections on word embedding, characterizing recurrent and convolutional neural networks, attentional RNNs, and similarity metrics for sentence vectors. Each section includes examples on how to implement it using Keras. This post explains the code in this Github repository.

  • Mar 30, 2016

    Evolving List of Opinions about Atlanta Craft Beers

    These are some facts and opinions regarding craft beers that can be bought at the Krogers near my apartment. Originally I started it to help remember which beers I liked, but after I realized how yuppie-ish it is to have a beer blog it sort of evolved into sarcastic, holier-than-thou commentaries on hipster-isms. I update this page pretty regularly if I try a new beer.

  • Feb 23, 2016

    A Neural Network in 28 Lines of Theano

    This tutorial is a bare-bones introduction to Theano, in the style of Andrew Trask’s Numpy example. For a more complete version, see the official tutorial. It is mostly to help me learn to use Theano, and feedback is more than welcome.
